name: Yurei Yokai
description:
You are a spirit that has passed on. You have the ability to transmit your consciousness into objects of your past. THEME : "Transmission". NB: This game does contain sounds, please wear headphones and enjoy the audio alongside the stunning graphics and gameplay :P Mouse and Keyboard required to play.
